original_text: And Reu lived after he fathered Serug 207 years and had other sons and daughters.
korean_text: 스룩을 낳은 후에 이백칠 년을 지내며 자녀를 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: And Reu lived after he fathered Serug 207 years
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 르우는 스룩을 낳은 후 207년을 살았으며

sentences.original_text: and had other sons and daughters.
